creator: tjsb@slb.com
text:
build.jar defines a baker's dozen properties for the 3rd party libraries, but 
only a dozen of them are actually used in the external.jars pattern set... 

Looks like jdom.jar should be included in the pattern set as well?

Not really - jdom isn't part of JMeter's runtime needs - it's there for
velocity, I believe, for developers who want to redo some documentation.
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
You're right - it's only needed by the Anakia tasks.

I hope to post a patch in due course to allow Anakia to run without needing the 
classpath to be defined externally, in which case I'll move the jdom.jar 
definition elsewehere.
creator: tjsb@slb.com
